feed.title: North East Margaree - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 7:00 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening and overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 5 cm in snow squalls. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
